I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
I'm from a small town in the Midwest where cookies are a big deal.
I just got the most adorable teddy bear to add to my collection!
i am a proofreader for a greeting card company.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I am a proofreader for a greeting card company. What about you?
I am a teacher. I like it because it is intellectually stimulating and I get to help people.
That's great! I like that you can work from home. I have to go to an office every day.
I understand. I like to be able to set my own hours and work at my own pace.
I like being able to collaborate with other people. It helps me to be more creative.
That makes sense. I think it's important to find a job that fits your personality and lifestyle.
I agree. I'm glad I found a job that I love. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my friends and family, reading, and watching movies.
I love to read too! I also like to go for walks in the woods and play with my dog.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm glad I met you.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends
